des:
With the Robot skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your Robot automation devices by voice!

First make sure you you have "Voice Control" checkbox selected for each device you want to control with Alexa. Do this by choosing the config pencil icon next to the device in the devices page that you want to control. Check the checkbox and choose save.

Once you have your devices enabled for voice control, select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App to link your Robot account and discover your devices.

"Alexa, turn on livingroom light."
"Alexa, turn off bathroom light"

If you want to add or remove devices from Alexa control, make the changes to each device by selecting or unselecting "Voice Control" once this setting is saved, you can simply say "Alexa discover devices" and it will find the changes.
